    • Method Detail

      • getAliases

        public Collection<Alias> getAliases()
        Description copied from interface: SecurityContext
        Returns a collection of all aliases that may be used in access rules, i.e. CURRENT_PRINCIPAL, CURRENT_ROLES or CURRENT_TENANT.
        Specified by:
        getAliases in interface SecurityContext

      • getAliasValue

        public Object getAliasValue(Alias alias)
        Description copied from interface: SecurityContext
        Returns the current value of the specified alias. JPA Security will determine from the usage of an alias in an access rule if an alias is collection-valued, that means if the value of an alias is a collection (i.e. CURRENT_ROLES) or not. If the value of an alias is a collection, this method will not be called, but SecurityContext.getAliasValues(Alias) will be called instead.
        Specified by:
        getAliasValue in interface SecurityContext

      • getAliasValues

        public <T> Collection<T> getAliasValues(Alias alias)
        Description copied from interface: SecurityContext
        Returns the current value of the specified collection-valued alias. JPA Security will determine from the usage of an alias in an access rule if an alias is collection-valued, that means if the value of an alias is a collection (i.e. CURRENT_ROLES) or not. Only in the case that the alias is collection-valued, this method will be called, otherwise SecurityContext.getAliasValue(Alias) will be called.
        Specified by:
        getAliasValues in interface SecurityContext
